scripts.build:staging: rm dist -rf && ng build --configuration staging && npm run scully
scripts.build:production: rm dist -rf && ng build --configuration production && npm run scully
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && git add . && git commit -m'Rebuild and deploy' && git push origin staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && git add . && git commit -m'Rebuild and deploy' && git push origin production
scripts.stage: git checkout staging && git merge dev && git push && git checkout dev
scripts.golive: git checkout master && git merge dev && git push && git checkout dev
scripts.sync-all: npm run golive && npm run stage
